actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Contracts and Printing.

official_title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code to require that Federal publications which are distributed to the public free of charge shall bear a statement indicating that the printing and distribution of such publications are financed by United States taxpayers.

summary.text: Requires that Government publications which are distributed to the public upon request and free of charge include a statement that the printing and distribution of the publication are financed by U.S. taxpayers. Requires that advertisements for such publications also include such statement.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code to require that Federal publications which are distributed to the public free of charge shall bear a statement indicating that the printing and distribution of such publications are financed by United States taxpayers.
